description:
hyper-v has no support of cinder fibre-channel attachment.
The doc below has not been updated since grizzly.

http://docs.openstack.org/liberty/config-reference/content/fibrechannel.html
title: Hyper-V does not support fibre channel

comments.content:
hyper-v has no support of cinder fibre-channel attachment.
The doc below has not been updated since grizzly.

http://docs.openstack.org/liberty/config-reference/content/fibrechannel.html

comments.content: There's an approved blueprint for fibre channel support on Hyper-V: https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/hyperv-fibre-channel
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~alexpilotti
